label:
This is an email notification that is sent to the creator of the bulletin post when someone likes the original bulletin post.
You can insert the following dynamic values:

##ActivityTitle## - Head description of the bulletin post
##CreatedDate## - Date when the like was added
##FullName## - Name of the user who liked the bulletin

template.subject: Bulletin - like added
template.body: ##FullName## has added a like to your post: ##ActivityTitle##
